website_summaries.verdict: Choosy Chef gets points for style and innovation with this modern cheese plate, and the fact that its acacia wood base is far sturdier than bamboo gives it even more value.
pros: Includes trio of cheese cutting and serving utensils
Clever magnetic design keeps utensils stuck to cheese plate
cons: We wish this cheese plate were a bit larger

customer_reviews.title: Picture Lies
customer_reviews.text: It clearly shows cheese on the platter among other items....You don't get any of these items excecpt the cheese knife and a platter...You would do better using your plates from home. If you were ordering a car and it arrived with no wheels, but the pictures showed wheels , you would think I been hood-winked...
customer_reviews.author: Jerry S.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Love my board. Very durable and easy to clean. The utensils magnetically stick to the board for easy storage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: This cheese board was perfect for a Christmas Hostess gift!! I prepared the charcuterie and it was absolutely beautiful!! A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Robinson

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a person cheese board since I needed one with enough space for cheese, crackers, nuts, glass of wine, etc . This fits everything perfectly and I feel safe my wine glass won’t spill while watching tv. I love how it’s magnetic and i hung it in my kitchen. Works just great for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Fernández

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: Great for a small cheese board! Used it during new year when I had guests staying. Love that the utensils stay on the board with magnets. Cute design.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Skilling

customer_reviews.title: Good quality item!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item as a gift. My sister loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dovell

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: great value! very pleased, and love the little card that came with on how to have the perfect cheese board.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little cheese board
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the price and looks so nice while in use!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Picture is deceiving.
customer_reviews.text: Shows item with an assortment of quality foods. If I was going to buy a motorcycle and it can with no wheels I'd be pissed. Come on, at least make a note that says food does not come with the platter.
customer_reviews.author: Favorite Kid

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I didn't notice that it was magnetic (not being one for details). I was delighted by how nice this board looks and by it being magnetic.
customer_reviews.author: Karri

customer_reviews.title: really nice cheese board
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for m Grandson in law he was thrilled with this board
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: great Magnet, heavy for the price 👍 so worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: Nice gift for a dear friend I added vinyl and some adhesive to it. And the magnet still worked great. She loved it
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Cute but disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept of this little board with magnetic tools. Tools are sharp and work very well! The negative - the board split within a week. I had only used it once and simply wiped it down with a damp paper towel after use. Don’t really see any reason it should have split.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wes Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!! A lil small
customer_reviews.text: Soooo cute! Very nice !! Great gift !! A lil small, but we love it
customer_reviews.author: cardin b.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than what I expected but very cute and fits what I need it for. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: ShayCo

customer_reviews.title: Love the magnetic utensils
customer_reviews.text: We have a lot of copper in our kitchen so I was excited to get this. It’s beautiful, just the right size and the magnetic tools are a great bonus.
customer_reviews.author: T Rod

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wood!!
customer_reviews.text: Great cheese board. It’s just the right size and nicely made. The magnetic accessories are great!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette D. Lambird

customer_reviews.title: Well pleased
customer_reviews.text: This item was a gift. My family member was very pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: merla

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: After I washed it to use it the paint or color started to chip. Poor made unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn

customer_reviews.title: A perfect Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchase as a gift! Always Gets compliments! Trendy, has a serving knifes! Amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and sturdy board.
customer_reviews.text: Great board. Sturdy, thick, and very good looking. The magnetic utensils are handy and make it nice and easy to store and display.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I purchased this item! Perfect cheese board for a small gathering. Beautifully made and easy to clean. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Nydia M.

customer_reviews.title: Modern and Chic Cutting Board
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cutting board for a picnic party and not only is it beautiful with the gold accents but it also comes with cheese knives that magnetically stick to the board. This is a must buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Taniqua Scott

customer_reviews.title: Looks Impressive, Would Make Nice Gift
customer_reviews.text: My first impression was that this board was well made. I liked the deep color of the wood paired with the cooper utensils. I ended up not keeping the board because it was on the smaller size and I was looking for something much larger.
customer_reviews.author: meghan hernandez

customer_reviews.title: size
customer_reviews.text: smaller than what I need. I haven't used it yet. I do like that the cutters come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Hightower

customer_reviews.title: Very cool looking and useful cheese and meat board
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift to a friend. She loves it and uses it all the time. I love the look of it and also love the magnetic utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Tarnow

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor remodeled her kitchen-I wanted to get her a gift to show her my excitement for her. She absolutely loved it. The gold trim matched her cabinet pulls and light fixtures and the wood matched her floors and beams. It was a win! We were both extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: D.  B. DeHart

customer_reviews.title: Oh yes! Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter who is a charcuterie master and she loved it for her “just the two of us” serving as opposed to dragging out the big board. And it fits on her bar cart when not in use. I was not disappointed to find I got two by mistake, mine or theirs who knows. Now I have a nice board to use as well. The tools are a super addition too!
customer_reviews.author: Linda M Day

customer_reviews.title: Cute board
customer_reviews.text: I use these all the time. The board is quite small, so I usually end up having to pull out another board, but this is really nice for picnics or charcuterie for one or two people. I also like that the board is magnetic so the knives stick to them. The magnet is not so strong though, so if the knives are not in the center of the board, it will fall off.
customer_reviews.author: hanbit

customer_reviews.title: PAY ATTENTION TO THE SIZE
customer_reviews.text: I know the measurements are listed but the items displayed completely threw off what I was expecting. The knives don't magnetize well either. I gave it as a gift and was a little embarrassed.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Galante

customer_reviews.title: Best cheeseboard I ever seen!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing board! Love every piece of it! Love the fact that it’s magnetic everything stays together! Thinking of buying another one!
customer_reviews.author: Svitlana Selivanov

customer_reviews.title: Split down the middle
customer_reviews.text: Good price, looks great, perfect size for two people. Only one problem and kind of a big one : Used it once wiped it off after use and I noticed recently that it has split down the middle. About 3-4 inches. Really unfortunate because I really like this lil board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great compact board, perfect for picnics
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this board for a friend's birthday because she needed a good picnic board and this absolutely fit the bill. It arrived in great condition and the magnetic knives work very well. Would definitely purchase again for myself or for another gift.
customer_reviews.author: Katazon

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Board is very smooth and solid, no rough edges or cracks, and is very dense heavy wood. Utensils are a bit thin and certainly won't cut through hard cheese but work more in a decorative role.
customer_reviews.author: Bradster

customer_reviews.title: Great cheese board
customer_reviews.text: Love this cheese board. It's somewhat small if you like a lot of items on your cheese plate but overall a great buy. Tools are very useful and sit well on board when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Juice

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It's a really nice piece for special occasions or for everyday use. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: A.R

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and love the magnetic board. The pieces will never get lost in the kitchen black hole
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a holiday party at work this year we did a white elephant theme and so many people wanted to take this from each other.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

product_meta.title: Magnetic Cheeseboard with Serving Utensils by Choosy Chef – Charcuterie Board. Includes a Guide to Best Wine & Cheese Pairings (10 Inch, Brushed Copper)
feature_bullets: DESIGNED TO SERVE WITH STYLE: Serve up style and sophistication at your next cocktail party with Choosy Chef’s Magnetic Cheese Board Set. Blending natural wood grain with trendy brushed copper elements - it’s the perfect serving platter to showcase your favorite cheese and meat pairings. Our wood serving board has enough room to fit wedges of your favorite cheeses, fruit slices, select cold cuts, and crackers.

CHARCUTERIE BOARD ESSENTIALS: The Choosy Chef Magnetic Cheese Board Set comes with a 10 inch diameter magnetic round wood tray, a cheese knife or cheese slicer that cuts both hard and semi-hard cheeses, a serving fork for more crumbly cheeses, and a serving spatula for soft cheeses. All 3 utensils fit on the magnetic board for easy storage.

HIGH QUALITY CONSTRUCTION FROM SUSTAINABLE MATERIALS: The Choosy Chef cheese platter is made with 100% sustainable Acacia wood hardwood. Choosy Chef cheese board set is naturally water resistant and won’t warp unlike bamboo cheeseboard products. The cutlery set is stainless steel and dishwasher safe.

GIFT FOR ANY OCCASION: The ideal gift for the ultimate foodie. The Choosy Chef Magnetic Cheese Board with Serving Utensils makes for a unique wedding present or house warming present. Includes step by step instructions for putting together an amazing cheese platter and choosing the best wine and cheese pairings.

WHY CHOOSE CHOOSY CHEF: Choosy Chef is an American-based, veteran-owned company with an eye for bringing beautiful and functional kitchen and dining products to our customers. Every product is designed and crafted with the utmost attention to detail and care so you can purchase with confidence.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars177 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
